subject: Our Ref: gofc/frb/bofa/643-1
body:
Our Ref: gofc/frb/bofa/643-12-XX Q1/X/200696/101
 
Dear Funds Beneficiary,
 
RE: ARE YOU DEAD OR ALIVE ? CONFIRMATION OF YOUR FUND TRANSFER
 
In the course of our General Auditing and Accounts revision of this new quarter of the year 2022, we discovered that the Bank Accounts belonging to some Beneficiaries have been changed on the basis that the owners have DIED after contacting COVID ’19 (without leaving a WILL) some time last year (2021) or have given out an authorization note of change of data shortly before their death.
 
After the investigations however, it was revealed that there are Foreigners who are collaborating with Retired or former Staff to make these changes illegally without the knowledge of the Bonafide Beneficiaries and there is one suck alterations traced to your data been changed to one Mr. Gubochkin Andrei Nikolaevich of Address- Russia city Naberezhnye Chelny, RUSSIA who said you are dead, hence they have tried to prove bearing your name so as to divert your proposed funds, IT WAS STATED THAT YOU DIED OF HEART FAILURE caused by COVID’19 Infection.
 
They have also forwarded the bank account below as the new account that will receive this fund / money.
 
Account details:
Beneficiary account number: 40817840922646001045
Number VISACard: 4893 4704 3599 3388
Beneficiary: Gubochkin Andrei Nikolaevich
Beneficiary`s bank: VTB (Public Joint- Stok Company)
Beneficiary SWIFT: VTBRRUM2SA3
Address - 191144, St. Petersburg, Degtyarny lane, 11, lit. A
Tel 8 (800) 100-24-24 (free call within Russia) 8 (495) 777-24-24
Email: 
info@vtb.ru
 (for inquiries and suggestions) 
compliance@vtb.ru
 (for insiders)
Website: 
www.vtb.ru
Correspondent bank: CITIBANK NA, New York, USA
Correspondent SWIFT: CITIUS33
Account with correspondent bank number: 36208997
 
But we wanted to confirm once again if actually this is true and decided to write to your email address for confirmation, which after 48 hours from today and there is no response, we shall then carry out payment in their favour.
 
If proved otherwise by you that you did not die, please forward to us all your related details including:
 
(a). Your full names,
(b). Direct telephone numbers,
(c). Contact address
(d). A copy of your ID and
(e). Lastly, details of your payment. These details from you will help to assist us reach a conclusion that you are not dead and that the fund in question belongs to you.
 
Anything contrary to this claim will help us charge this man to court and prosecute him while your fund will be paid to you immediately without any further delay. You have to get back to us on time for us to commence legal proceedings against Mr. Gubochkin Andrei Nikolaevich of Address- Russia city Naberezhnye Chelny, RUSSIA and his criminal associates.
 
You have 24hours to respond to this message or else we carry out payment in their favour as the fund has been programmed for payment this week.
 
Thanks,
 
Sincerely Yours,
 
Barkev Hagopian
Senior Manager, Int'l Services
Global Offshore Financial Centre (GOFC)
Add: Columbus, GA 31909, USA
Tel: +1 737-529-3704
Fax: +1 706-641-6417
Working Hours: 24/7
 
Remarks: The information contained in this message may be privileged and confidential and protected from disclosure. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, or an employee or agent responsible for delivering this message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by replying to this message and deleting it from your computer. Thank you. Copyright © 2024 - Global Offshore Financial Centre, Columbus, GA 31909, USA. All Rights Reserved.
 
CC: File

subject: Re:   Our Ref: gofc/frb/bofa/643-1
body:
Dear Barkev Hagopian,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must admit, I am quite surprised by the information you have shared. It is indeed alarming to hear that someone has claimed that I am deceased and attempted to change my bank account details.

I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. However, I must admit that I am a bit confused about how this situation has unfolded. Could you please provide me with more details about how this individual, Mr. Gubochkin Andrei, came to possess my personal information? Additionally, what steps can we take to rectify this situation and ensure that my funds are not diverted?

I understand the urgency of the matter and will provide you with the requested information promptly. However, before doing so, I would appreciate some clarification on the process moving forward.

Thank you for your assistance in resolving this issue.

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Attn: Doris (Fund Beneficiary), !!Urgent/Important!!, thanks for your message, kindly reconfirm your details to us urgently, please here attached is the Id of Mr. Gubochkin Andrei Nikolaevich for to check if you know him
body:
Priority- Very High



Our Ref: gofc/frb/bofa/643-12-XX Q1/X/200696/102



Attn: Doris (Fund  Beneficiary)

Email: hh34692@***.com,

Amount: US$5.5Million (Approved Part Payment),



*RE: KINDLY RECONFIRM YOUR DETAILS TO US URGENTLY*



We have received your message denying been dead and also denying giving
anyone authority to receive your funds on your behalf, in view of this we
will like you to re-confirm the following to us so that we can compare it
with the information in our IT UNICODE Computer data base, it is very
important that you send to us the below required information so that we can
be sure that you are the true and authentic owner of the aforementioned
fund and that you are the true beneficiary:



*** Please here attached is the* Id of Mr. **Gubochkin Andrei Nikolaevich
for to double check if you know him.*



Your full names:  ???????????????????????????,



Address: ???????????????????????????,



Direct Telephone Numbers: ???????????????????????????,



Amount: ???????????????????????????,



Beneficiary’s Bank: ???????????????????????????



Beneficiary’s Bank Address: ???????????????????????????



Beneficiary’s Bank telephone, fax numbers: ???????????????????????????



Account name:  ???????????????????????????



Account No.: ???????????????????????????



Swift Code: ???????????????????????????



Other information that you feel might be vital to the release of your funds.



As soon as we receive and reconfirm the above requested information, we
shall refer your payment for immediate programming and release through any
of the approved mode of payment via any of the Financial Institutions in
charge of the financial zoning of the geographical region under which the
country of origin of your funds payment falls. The Accredited Financial
Institutions / Fiduciary agent will also commence immediate release process
of your funds to you through the special arrangement under this scheme.



We will like to state that you stop all forms of communication with all
these fake officials that have been in contact with you all these while as
we will not entertain any form of distraction from any quarters.



Expecting immediate reply as we wish you long life and sound health.



Thanks,



Sincerely Yours,



Barkev Hagopian

Senior Manager, Int'l Services

Global Offshore Financial Centre (GOFC)

Add: Columbus, GA 31909, USA

Tel: +1 737-529-3704

Fax: +1 706-641-6417

Email: customerservice@offc-f.org

Working Hours: 24/7



*Remarks:* The information contained in this message may be privileged and
confidential and protected from disclosure. If the reader of this message
is not the intended recipient, or an employee or agent responsible for
delivering this message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified
that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is
strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error,
please notify us immediately by replying to this message and deleting it
from your computer. Thank you. *Copyright © 2022/23 -* *Global Offshore
Financial Centre, Columbus, GA 31909, USA*. All Rights Reserved.



CC: File

subject: Re: Attn: Doris (Fund Beneficiary), !!Urgent/Important!!, thanks for your message, kindly reconfirm your details to us urgently, please here attached is the Id of Mr. Gubochkin Andrei Nikolaevich for to check if you know him
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern and willingness to help. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify the purpose of this request? I want to make sure that I understand the situation correctly.

Also, could you explain what you mean by "fake officials"? It would be helpful to have more information about who these individuals are and why I should avoid contact with them.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: Attn: Doris (Fund Beneficiary thanks for your message, this business transaction is very legal and according to both National and International laws, so kindly reconfirm your details to us urgently and please find attached a copy of my Passport Id.
body:
Hello Barkev Hagopian,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided. It's good to know that this business is legal and complies with national laws.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify what exactly the approved payment advice is? How does it work and what are the steps involved in receiving the funds?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the verification process with government agencies. Which specific agencies should I contact to verify the documents?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Doris
